abstract: “We are in an abnormal and increasingly unfair situation,” Louis Gallois, the chief of EADS, said of the bidding for a big Air Force contract.
snippet: “We are in an abnormal and increasingly unfair situation,” Louis Gallois, the chief of EADS, said of the bidding for a big Air Force contract.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The chief executive of the parent company of Airbus expressed frustration over the weekend at a recent decision by the World Trade Organization to delay a report on European claims that Boeing has received billions of dollars in federal subsidies.

headline.main: W.T.O. Ruling Upsets Chief of Jet Maker
headline.print_headline: W.T.O. Ruling Upsets Chief Of Jet Maker

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
